Class Barbershop

java.lang.Object
  Barbershop

public class Barbershop
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
Jan Stroet The Barbershop is a monitor in which customers get a haircut and the barber gets customers to do a haircut

Constructor Summary

Method Summary
 void getHaircut()
          a customer will call this method to get a haircut
 Customer nextCustomer()
          Called by the barber to get the next customer to cut
 void showOut(Customer customer)
          Called by the barber to show the customer out, who just got a haircut
